title: Masher The Bottun [REUPLOAD] [REUPLOAD]
author: EpicToast, FNLamaCool13, Quinn Wuest
description:
To be fair, you have to have a very high IQ to understand Lama modules. The solving method is very complex, and without a solid grasp of theoretical physics most of the manual will go over a typical expert's head.

This is a reupload of EpicToast's module with changes and bug fixes. Unsubscribe from the old version here: 
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2086041932

Module ID: masherTheBottun
HTML Manual: https://ktane.timwi.de/HTML/Masher%20The%20Button.html
PDF Manual: https://ktane.timwi.de/PDF/Masher%20The%20Button.pdf
